attributes.action: force Tony Blair to be tried for warcrimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I and many others feel Tony Blair acting as prime minister for the UK, deceived the British people over the conflict with Iraq.
The subsequent justification for this conflict has since been proved to have been false, therefore the acting prime minister should be held responsible for his actions as would any other person who made such a misguided error with such catastrophic results.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
